## Professional Summary

Dynamic and accomplished Senior Project Manager with 10+ years of experience leading cross-functional teams in delivering complex technology projects. PMP certified with a proven track record of managing multimillion-dollar budgets, mitigating risks, and exceeding stakeholder expectations. Expert in Agile and Waterfall methodologies with strong communication and leadership skills.

---

## Core Competencies

**Project Management:** Agile, Scrum, Kanban, Waterfall, Hybrid Methodologies  
**Tools:** JIRA, Confluence, MS Project, Asana, Monday.com, Smartsheet  
**Leadership:** Team Building, Stakeholder Management, Conflict Resolution  
**Technical:** Software Development Lifecycle, API Integration, Cloud Migration  
**Business:** Budget Management, Risk Assessment, Vendor Management, Contract Negotiation

## Professional Experience

### Senior Project Manager
**GlobalTech Enterprises** | New York, NY  
*March 2019 – Present*

- Led portfolio of 8 concurrent projects with combined budget of $15M
- Managed cross-functional teams of 25+ members across 3 time zones
- Delivered enterprise cloud migration project 2 weeks ahead of schedule, saving $500K
- Established PMO best practices adopted company-wide for 50+ projects
- Achieved 98% stakeholder satisfaction rating through proactive communication

### Project Manager
**Digital Innovations Corp** | Boston, MA  
*July 2015 – February 2019*

- Managed end-to-end delivery of customer relationship management platform
- Reduced project delivery time by 25% through process optimization
- Coordinated with offshore development teams across India and Poland
- Implemented risk management framework reducing project issues by 40%
- Mentored 3 associate project managers, all promoted within 18 months

### Associate Project Manager
**ConsultPro Services** | Chicago, IL  
*September 2012 – June 2015*

- Supported senior PMs in managing enterprise software implementations
- Created comprehensive project documentation including charters and status reports
